scripts.dev: bun run predev && bunx electrobun build --env=dev && bunx electrobun dev
scripts.predev: bun run --cwd ../../packages/core build:dev && bun run --cwd ../../packages/ui-solid build
scripts.build: bun run prebuild && bunx electrobun build --env=dev
scripts.build:canary: bun run prebuild && bunx electrobun build --env=canary
scripts.build:stable: bun run prebuild && bunx electrobun build --env=stable
scripts.prebuild: bun run --cwd ../../packages/core build && bun run --cwd ../../packages/ui-solid build
